original_text: When we tell people to obey God's message, we are not saying anything that is not true. We do not have a wrong purpose. We are not trying to deceive anyone.
korean_text: 우리의 권면은 간사함이나 부정에서 난 것이 아니요 속임수로 하는 것도 아니라

sentences.original_text: When we tell people to obey God's message
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 사람들에게 하나님의 메시지를 순종하라고 말할 때

sentences.original_text: we are not saying anything that is not true
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 거짓된 것을 말하는 것이 아닙니다

sentences.original_text: We do not have a wrong purpose
We are not trying to deceive anyone
